title: Specimen slideshow release
content: [Letters from Antarctica](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013142144/http:/bit.ly/7vAHGY) is a wonderful slideshow designed by the creative team of Veer to announce the launch of my new font [Business Penmanship](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013142144/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000507)
author: Ale Paul

comments.content: Lovely work as always, Ale! I think I might buy myself an early birthday present...
